Plot: About a 1839 mutiny aboard a slave ship that is traveling towards the northeastern coast of America. Much of the story involves a court-room drama about the free man who led the revolt.
Title: Amistad
Actors: Morgan Freeman, Nigel Hawthorne, Anthony Hopkins, Djimon Hounsou
Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 9 wins & 38 nominations.
